The story follows Smilla, a half Inuit woman who investigates the mysterious death of an Inuit boy. This film is both thought-provoking and visually stunning, making it a great choice for your preference!

Another interesting option could be "Island of the Blue Dolphins" – a heartwarming tale about a young Native American girl who's stranded on an island. The movie showcases her determination to survive and the bond she forms with a wild dog, creating an unforgettable cinematic experience.

If you're looking for something lighter with a comedic twist, "Little Fockers" (2010) might be up your alley. It's a family comedy centered around a male nurse trying to win over his father-in-law and secure the future of his family. Ben Stiller and Robert De Niro star in this film. Enjoy the laughs!
